1495520.name: The Mikado Birdgirl in Taichung -Original Sound Track-
1495520.description:
"The Leopard Catgirl in Miaoli -Original Sound Track-" is Erotes Studio's Original Sound Track. The album contains 4 Songs and 10 Background music.

1.Call Me by Your Name
2.Dazed and Confused
3.Fight Club
4.Hide And Seek
5.If You Strain Your Ears
6.It
7.My Summer of Taichung
8.Stand by Us
9.Suspiria
10.Taichung Holiday
11.Daily life
12.Daily life Instrumental
13.Heart Rhythm
14.Heart Rhythm Instrumental
